definitions.usage: 描述某人在面对恐惧、危险或困难时表现出无畏或坚定的品质，常用于赞扬个人或群体的行为。

examples.scene: 一位消防员在火灾现场不顾个人安危冲进燃烧的建筑物救人，周围的人都为他的行为感到震撼。
examples.chineseIdea: 在紧急情况下，愿意冒着生命危险去帮助他人，展现出无私和坚定的品质。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The firefighter @ @ @ by rushing into the burning building to save the trapped family.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The firefighter 「acted with courage」 by rushing into the burning building to save the trapped family.
examples.chineseTranslation: 消防员通过冲进燃烧的建筑物救出被困的家庭「表现出了勇气」。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：He very brave to save people. 纠正：He acted with great courage to save people.

examples.scene: 一位年轻的学生在学校会议上公开反对不公平的政策，尽管知道可能会遭到批评或排斥。
examples.chineseIdea: 在面对可能的负面后果时，仍然坚持自己的信念并公开表达意见。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The student @ @ by speaking out against the unfair policy in front of the entire school.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The student 「showed courage」 by speaking out against the unfair policy in front of the entire school.
examples.chineseTranslation: 这位学生通过在全校面前公开反对不公平的政策「展现了勇气」。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：She is brave to say her opinion. 纠正：She showed courage by expressing her opinion.

definitions.meaning: 大胆的，敢于尝试新事物
definitions.usage: 描述某人在决策或行动中敢于冒险或尝试新方法，通常带有创新或突破的含义。

examples.scene: 一位创业者在经济不稳定的时期决定辞去稳定的工作，创立一家以环保为主题的公司。
examples.chineseIdea: 愿意放弃安全的选择，追求一个有风险但有意义的目标。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The entrepreneur @ @ @ @ by launching an eco-friendly startup during a recession.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The entrepreneur 「made a courageous decision」 by launching an eco-friendly startup during a recession.
examples.chineseTranslation: 这位创业者通过在经济衰退期间创立一家环保初创公司「做出了大胆的决定」。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：He is brave to start new business. 纠正：He made a courageous decision to start a new business.

examples.scene: 一位艺术家决定放弃传统的绘画风格，尝试一种全新的、实验性的艺术形式，尽管可能会不被市场接受。
examples.chineseIdea: 愿意挑战常规，追求独特的创意表达，即使可能面临失败。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The artist @ @ @ @ by experimenting with an unconventional art form.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The artist 「took a courageous step」 by experimenting with an unconventional art form.
examples.chineseTranslation: 这位艺术家通过尝试一种非传统的艺术形式「迈出了大胆的一步」。
examples.chinglishFix: 中式英语：She brave to try new art. 纠正：She took a courageous step to try a new art form.
